absolute.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

alt.description: Alternate text for screen readers. Leave empty for decorative images.
alt.description_zh: 屏幕阅读器的替换文本。对于装饰性图像，请留空。

aspect-ratio.description: Calculated as width/height, so for a 1920x1080px image this will be 1.7778. Will be calculated automatically if omitted.
aspect-ratio.description_zh: 以宽度/高度计算，因此对于 1920x1080 像素的图像，这将是 1.7778。如果省略，将自动计算。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用工具颜色（例如 success 或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在 colors 页面上查找内置类的列表。

content-class.description: Apply a custom class to the internal content element.
content-class.description_zh: 将自定义类应用于 internal content 元素。

cover.description: Resizes the background image to cover the entire container.
cover.description_zh: 调整背景图像的大小以覆盖整个容器。

crossorigin.description: Specify that images should be fetched with CORS enabled MDN
crossorigin.description_zh: 指定应在启用 CORS 的 MDN 下获取图像

draggable.description: Controls the draggable behavior of the image. See MDN.
draggable.description_zh: 控制图像的可拖动行为。请参阅 MDN。

eager.description: Forces the component’s content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.
eager.description_zh: 强制组件的内容在挂载时呈现。如果您的内容不会在 DOM 中呈现，并且您希望为 SEO 抓取，这将非常有用。

gradient.description: The gradient to apply to the image. Only supports linear-gradient syntax, anything else should be done with classes.
gradient.description_zh: 要应用于图像的渐变。仅支持线性渐变语法，其他任何事情都应该用 class 来完成。

height.description: Sets the height for the component.

inline.description: Display as an inline element instead of a block, also disables flex-grow.
inline.description_zh: Display as a inline element 而不是 block，也会禁用 flex-grow。

lazy-src.description: Something to show while waiting for the main image to load, typically a small base64-encoded thumbnail. Has a slight blur filter applied. NOTE: This prop has no effect unless either height or aspect-ratio are provided.
lazy-src.description_zh: 在等待主图像加载时要显示的内容，通常是 base64 编码的小缩略图。应用了轻微的模糊滤镜。注意： 除非提供 height 或 aspect-ratio，否则此 prop 无效。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

options.description: Options that are passed to the Intersection observer constructor.
options.description_zh: 传递给 Intersection observer 构造函数的选项。

position.description: Applies object-position styles to the image and placeholder elements.
position.description_zh: 将对象位置样式应用于图像和占位符元素。

referrerpolicy.type: / no-referrer / no-referrer-when-downgrade / origin / origin-when-cross-origin / same-origin / strict-origin / strict-origin-when-cross-origin / unsafe-url
referrerpolicy.description: Define which referrer is sent when fetching the resource MDN
referrerpolicy.description_zh: 定义在获取资源 MDN 时发送的反向链接

rounded.description: Designates the border-radius applied to the component. This can be 0, xs, sm, true, lg, xl, pill, circle, and shaped. Find more information on available border radius classes on the Border Radius page.
rounded.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 border-radius。这可以是 0、xs、sm、true、lg、xl、pill、circle 和 shaped。在 Border Radius 页面上查找有关可用边界半径类的更多信息。

sizes.description: For use with srcset, see MDN.
sizes.description_zh: 有关与 srcset 一起使用的信息，请参阅 MDN。

src.type: | string  | { src: string; srcset: string; lazySrc: string; aspect: number }
src.description: The image URL. This prop is mandatory.
src.description_zh: 图像 URL。此 prop 是强制性的。

srcset.description: A set of alternate images to use based on device size. Read more….
srcset.description_zh: 根据设备大小使用的一组备用映像。阅读更多....

tile.description: Removes any applied border-radius from the component.
tile.description_zh: 从组件中删除任何应用的 border-radius。

transition.description: The transition to use when switching from lazy-src to src. Can be one of the built in or custom transition.
transition.description_zh: 从 lazy-src 切换到 src 时要使用的过渡。可以是内置或自定义过渡之一。

width.description: Sets the width for the component.

events.name: error
events.description: Emitted if the image fails to load.
events.description_zh: 如果图像加载失败，则发出。

events.name: load
events.description: Emitted when the image is loaded.

events.name: loadstart
events.description: Emitted when the image starts to load.
events.description_zh: 在映像开始加载时发出。

slots.name: error
slots.description: Will be shown if the image fails to load, replacing the placeholder slot.
slots.description_zh: 如果图像加载失败，则会显示，替换占位符槽。

slots.name: placeholder
slots.description: Display an overlay while the image is loading.
slots.description_zh: 在加载图像时显示叠加层。

slots.name: sources
slots.description: A list of elements. If this slot is used v-img will render a instead of .
slots.description_zh: 元素列表。如果使用此插槽，v-img 将呈现 a 而不是 。
